issue.title: [Python] Add documentation for different forms of constructing nested arrays from Python data structures
issue.body:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1937?focusedCommentId=16371960) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Since we have done a bunch of work on this for 0.9.0, it would be a real shame to not have documentation showcasing the results. I'm leaving this on 0.9.0
